description.zh-cn: 指时任重庆市副市长兼公安局长王立军于2012年2月6日私自前往美国驻成都总领事馆滞留的政治事件。
description.en: A political incident where Wang Lijun, then Vice Mayor and Public Security Chief of Chongqing, entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu on February 6, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政府官员、公安局长，王立军事件的核心人物。
description.en: Former Chinese government official and police chief, the central figure in the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，时任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, then a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国律师，薄熙来之妻，因谋杀尼尔·海伍德而被定罪。
description.en: Chinese lawyer, wife of Bo Xilai, convicted for the murder of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家族有商业往来，后被谷开来毒杀。
description.en: British businessman who had business dealings with the Bo Xilai family, later murdered by Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 指英国商人尼尔·海伍德于2011年11月在重庆被谋杀的刑事案件，该案的调查是王立军事件的直接导火索。
description.en: The criminal case concerning the murder of British businessman Neil Heywood in Chongqing in November 2011. The investigation of this case was the direct trigger for the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 由王立军事件引发的一系列政治事件，最终导致中共中央政治局委员薄熙来被免职、调查和判刑。
description.en: A series of political events triggered by the Wang Lijun incident, which ultimately led to the dismissal, investigation, and sentencing of Politburo member Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，王立军事件发生时任美国国务卿。
description.en: American politician, who was the U.S. Secretary of State at the time of the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 美国在中国成都设立的外交机构，王立军曾进入该领事馆寻求庇护。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the United States in Chengdu, China. Wang Lijun entered this consulate to seek asylum.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国政府负责反间谍和政治安全的主要情报机关，其官员将王立军从成都带往北京。
description.en: The main intelligence agency of the Chinese government responsible for counter-espionage and political security. Its officials escorted Wang Lijun from Chengdu to Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来家的勤务人员，协助谷开来谋杀了尼尔·海伍德。
description.en: A staff member in Gu Kailai's household who assisted her in the murder of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市公安局副局长，因在海伍德死亡案中徇私枉法而被判刑。
description.en: Then Deputy Director of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, sentenced for bending the law for personal gain in the Neil Heywood murder case.

nodes.id: 李阳 (重庆市刑警总队前总队长)

zh-cn: 李阳 (重庆市刑警总队前总队长)

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市公安局刑警总队总队长，因在海伍德死亡案中徇私枉法而被判刑。
description.en: Then head of the Criminal Police Corps of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, sentenced for bending the law for personal gain in the Neil Heywood murder case.

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市公安局技术侦察总队总队长，为王立军前往成都提供了车辆，并因在海伍德案中徇私枉法被判刑。
description.en: Then head of the Technical Reconnaissance Corps of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau. He provided a vehicle for Wang Lijun's trip to Chengdu and was sentenced for bending the law for personal gain in the Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 时任重庆市公安局沙坪坝区分局常务副局长，因在海伍德死亡案中徇私枉法而被判刑。
description.en: Then Executive Deputy Director of the Shapingba District Branch of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, sentenced for bending the law for personal gain in the Neil Heywood murder case.

description.zh-cn: 位于四川省成都市的法院，负责审理王立军案。
description.en: The court in Chengdu, Sichuan Province, which tried the Wang Lijun case.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，王立军事件发生时任重庆市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, who was the Mayor of Chongqing at the time of the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与谷开来之子，与尼尔·海伍德有经济纠纷。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Gu Kailai, who had financial disputes with Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国重庆市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Chongqing Municipality, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府下属主管公安工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department under the Chongqing Municipal People's Government in charge of public security work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，王立军事件和海伍德死亡案的主要发生地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the primary location of the Wang Lijun incident and the Neil Heywood murder case.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市政府官员，曾与谷开来一同要求医院出具王立军的虚假精神疾病诊断证明。
description.en: A Chongqing government official who, along with Gu Kailai, requested a hospital to issue a fraudulent medical certificate of mental illness for Wang Lijun.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国家安全部副部长，负责将王立军从成都带往北京。
description.en: Then Vice Minister of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, who was responsible for escorting Wang Lijun from Chengdu to Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关，曾对王立军展开调查，王立军也向其举报谷开来和薄熙来。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China, which had launched an investigation into Wang Lijun, and to which Wang also reported Gu Kailai and Bo Xilai.

zh-cn: 王立军徇私枉法、叛逃、滥用职权、受贿案

description.zh-cn: 对王立军本人进行的刑事案件审判。
description.en: The criminal trial against Wang Lijun himself.

zh-cn: 薄熙来受贿、贪污、滥用职权案

description.zh-cn: 对薄熙来本人进行的刑事案件审判。
description.en: The criminal trial against Bo Xilai himself.

nodes.id: 薄谷开来、张晓军故意杀人案

zh-cn: 薄谷开来、张晓军故意杀人案

description.zh-cn: 对谷开来与张晓军故意杀害尼尔·海伍德的刑事案件审判。
description.en: The criminal trial against Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun for the intentional homicide of Neil Heywood.

nodes.id: 郭维国、李阳、王鹏飞、王智徇私枉法案

zh-cn: 郭维国、李阳、王鹏飞、王智徇私枉法案
郭维国、李阳、王鹏飞、王智案

description.zh-cn: 对郭维国等四名重庆警官在海伍德死亡案中包庇谷开来而进行的刑事案件审判。
description.en: The criminal trial against four Chongqing police officials, including Guo Weiguo, for bending the law to protect Gu Kailai in the Neil Heywood murder case.

description.zh-cn: 王立军因向薄熙来汇报海伍德死亡案中谷开来的嫌疑而与薄熙来决裂，出于对自身安全的恐惧，王立军进入美国领事馆，从而引发王立军事件。
description.en: Wang Lijun's conflict with Bo Xilai began after he reported Gu Kailai's suspicion in the Heywood murder case. Fearing for his safety, Wang entered the US consulate, triggering the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件是薄熙来事件的直接开端，导致薄熙来被免职、调查及判刑。
description.en: The Wang Lijun incident was the direct trigger for the Bo Xilai incident, leading to Bo's dismissal, investigation, and imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 王立军进入美国领事馆的行为导致他本人被调查并以叛逃等罪名被起诉。
description.en: Wang Lijun's act of entering the US consulate led to his own investigation and prosecution on charges including defection.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件牵出了薄熙来的一系列违纪违法问题，最终导致薄熙来案的发生。
description.en: The Wang Lijun incident exposed a series of disciplinary and legal violations by Bo Xilai, ultimately leading to the Bo Xilai case.

relationships.target: 薄谷开来、张晓军故意杀人案

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件引发了对海伍德死亡案的复查，最终导致谷开来和张晓军因故意杀人被审判。
description.en: The Wang Lijun incident triggered a reinvestigation of the Neil Heywood murder, which led to the trial of Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun for intentional homicide.

relationships.target: 郭维国、李阳、王鹏飞、王智徇私枉法案

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件后，郭维国等四名警官在海伍德死亡案中掩盖罪行的行为被揭露，并因此被起诉。
description.en: After the Wang Lijun incident, the cover-up actions of four police officers, including Guo Weiguo, in the Neil Heywood murder case were exposed, leading to their prosecution.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来因认为尼尔·海伍德威胁其子薄瓜瓜的安全，在重庆南山丽景度假酒店将海伍德毒杀。
description.en: Believing Neil Heywood was a threat to her son Bo Guagua, Gu Kailai murdered Heywood by poison at the Nanshan Lijing Resort Hotel in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 张晓军作为谷家的勤务人员，协助谷开来按倒海伍德并强行灌入氰化物，共同实施了谋杀。
description.en: As a household employee, Zhang Xiaojun assisted Gu Kailai by restraining Heywood and forcing him to ingest cyanide, thereby participating in the murder.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来是薄熙来的妻子。
description.en: Gu Kailai is the wife of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the son of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是谷开来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is the son of Gu Kailai.

position.en: Vice Mayor, Public Security Bureau Chief

description.zh-cn: 王立军作为重庆市副市长和公安局长，是时任市委书记薄熙来的下属。
description.en: As Vice Mayor and Public Security Chief of Chongqing, Wang Lijun was a subordinate of Bo Xilai, who was the Municipal Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 王立军作为重庆市副市长，是时任市长黄奇帆的下属。
description.en: As Vice Mayor of Chongqing, Wang Lijun was a subordinate of Mayor Huang Qifan.

description.zh-cn: 在王立军汇报谷开来涉嫌杀人后，薄熙来掌掴王立军，并随后调整其分工，免去其公安局长职务，这些行为使王立军感到人身安全受威胁。
description.en: After Wang Lijun reported Gu Kailai's alleged involvement in the murder, Bo Xilai slapped him and subsequently removed him from his post as Public Security Chief, which made Wang fear for his personal safety.

description.zh-cn: 王立军私自进入美国驻成都总领事馆，滞留约一天，并提出政治避难申请。
description.en: Wang Lijun entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu without authorization, stayed for about a day, and requested political asylum.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿希拉里·克林顿决定拒绝向王立军提供政治避难。
description.en: Then U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton decided to deny Wang Lijun's request for political asylum.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

description.zh-cn: 王立军离开美国领事馆后，由国家安全部官员将其带往北京进行调查。
description.en: After leaving the U.S. consulate, Wang Lijun was escorted to Beijing by officials from the Ministry of State Security for investigation.

description.zh-cn: 成都市中级人民法院一审判处王立军有期徒刑15年，剥夺政治权利1年。
description.en: The Chengdu Intermediate People's Court sentenced Wang Lijun to 15 years in prison and deprived him of political rights for one year.

description.zh-cn: 郭维国与他人共同作出海伍德系酒后猝死的结论，掩盖了谋杀真相，从而妨碍了案件的正常调查。
description.en: Guo Weiguo, along with others, concluded that Heywood died of sudden cardiac arrest due to excessive drinking, covering up the murder and obstructing the proper investigation of the case.

relationships.source: 李阳 (重庆市刑警总队前总队长)

description.zh-cn: 李阳与他人共同作出海伍德系酒后猝死的结论，掩盖了谋杀真相，从而妨碍了案件的正常调查。
description.en: Li Yang, along with others, concluded that Heywood died of sudden cardiac arrest due to excessive drinking, covering up the murder and obstructing the proper investigation of the case.

description.zh-cn: 王鹏飞与他人共同作出海伍德系酒后猝死的结论，掩盖了谋杀真相，从而妨碍了案件的正常调查。
description.en: Wang Pengfei, along with others, concluded that Heywood died of sudden cardiac arrest due to excessive drinking, covering up the murder and obstructing the proper investigation of the case.

description.zh-cn: 王智与他人共同作出海伍德系酒后猝死的结论，掩盖了谋杀真相，从而妨碍了案件的正常调查。
description.en: Wang Zhi, along with others, concluded that Heywood died of sudden cardiac arrest due to excessive drinking, covering up the murder and obstructing the proper investigation of the case.

description.zh-cn: 王鹏飞为王立军提供了前往美国驻成都总领事馆时所驾驶的车辆。
description.en: Wang Pengfei provided the vehicle that Wang Lijun drove to the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 据时任市长黄奇帆称，王立军事件影响了投资者对重庆环境的研判，对招商引资工作造成了不利影响。
description.en: According to then-Mayor Huang Qifan, the Wang Lijun incident affected investors' judgment of Chongqing's environment and had an adverse impact on investment promotion.

description.zh-cn: 据时任市长黄奇帆称，薄熙来违纪问题影响了投资者对重庆环境的研判，对招商引资工作造成了不利影响。
description.en: According to then-Mayor Huang Qifan, Bo Xilai's disciplinary problems affected investors' judgment of Chongqing's environment and had an adverse impact on investment promotion.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中纪委于2011年10月启动了对王立军涉及辽宁省铁岭市腐败问题的调查。
description.en: The CCDI launched an investigation into Wang Lijun in October 2011 concerning corruption issues in Tieling, Liaoning Province.

description.zh-cn: 王立军曾向中纪委举报谷开来向海外转移巨额款项。
description.en: Wang Lijun reported to the CCDI that Gu Kailai was transferring large sums of money overseas.

description.zh-cn: 王立军曾向中纪委举报薄熙来在重庆搞“独立王国”，无视中央权威。
description.en: Wang Lijun reported to the CCDI that Bo Xilai was running Chongqing as an "independent kingdom," disregarding central authority.
